title: A Search for anti-worlds
creator_credit: Pyramid Films, Berkeley Film Associates and Philip Dauber
brief_description: Documents the course of physics research experiments at the Lawrence Berkeley Laboratory of the University of California, which seeks to determine the existence of large amounts of antimatter in the universe.
